sentences.en: He succinctly summed up his manifesto as "Work hard, train hard and play hard".
sentences.cn: 他把自己的宣言简练地总结为“努力干，努力练，努力玩”。

sentences.en: Here an update to the manifesto.
His manifesto promised measures to protect them.
sentences.cn: 他在宣言里保证要为他们采取保护措施。

sentences.en: If these manifestos are still true, is the architectural manifesto of functionalism now out of mode?
sentences.cn: 如果这些宣言仍然如此, 为什么建筑宣言的功能现在的模式?

sentences.en: The Fourteen point at once became the great manifesto of the war.
sentences.cn: 这十四点原则立即成为重要的战争宣言.

sentences.en: The Long March is a manifesto, a propaganda force, a seeding machine.
sentences.cn: 长征是宣言书, 长征是宣传队, 长征是播种机.

sentences.en: The Long March is a manifesto.
The manifesto gives pride of place to job creation.
sentences.cn: 这项宣言将创造工作机会放在首位。

sentences.en: The Rosicrucian manifesto created quite a stir in European circles.
sentences.cn: 蔷薇十字会的宣言对欧洲造成相当大的震动.

sentences.en: The Tories are due to publish their manifesto tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 保守党将于明天发表他们的宣言。

sentences.en: Their new manifesto hardly threatens to bring the whole edifice of capitalism crashing down.
sentences.cn: 他们新的宣言声称要摧毁整个资本主义大厦，这是不可能的。

sentences.en: This book could be considered to be the anti - classical education manifesto.
sentences.cn: 这本书可以被看作“ 反 传统教育宣言”.

sentences.en: We want to achieve victory by proudly displaying our campaign manifesto.
sentences.cn: 我们要自豪地陈述我们的竞选宣言,取得胜利.

phrases.tran_cn: 共产党宣言（现代共产主义学说发展史上的第一部经典，由马克思和恩格斯合著）

trans.tran_en: a written statement by a political party, saying what they believe in and what they intend to do
